message:
#PrayForEgypt #SaveEgypt #EgyptMassacre

Our new Victory sign ... dedicated to the heroes of Rabaa (fourth in Arabic) against the oppression and the brutality of the Coup forces ... 10 hours fighting with nothing but their own bodies against tanks and helicopters ... They are victorious no doubt about that!
